summary: A mod aimed at making Skyrim Middle-Earths parallel universe. Merging aspects from both world while staying true to the story! Although we are just in Pre-Alpha stages we would like to let you have our Rohan set! Which replaces whiteruns!
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://skyrimretexture.webs.com/apps/photos/photo?photoid=145350078[/img]

[center][b][color=\"FFF\"][font=\"Impact\"][size=15]The LoTR Project[/b][/size][/color][/font][font=\"Georgia\"]

Today is the alpha release containing

the full Edoras pack! This is our christmas

present to you!

========================================

[b]Description[/b]

========================================

Hello!

The LPteam here!

 

Alot has happend since our little mod

started. We are now an entire team containing

voice actors, scripters, texturers, animator

and modelers! Check out our video on this mod so far! Remember that this file is just for Rohan


[youtube]<object width=\"425\" height=\"350\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=88trpk3mJpk&context=C30ccc36ADOEgsToPDskKGsmXGPkkILjyi2rSfpcqa\"></param><param name=\"wmode\" value=\"transparent\"></param><embed src=\"http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=88trpk3mJpk&context=C30ccc36ADOEgsToPDskKGsmXGPkkILjyi2rSfpcqa\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" wmode=\"transparent\" width=\"425\" height=\"350\"></embed></object>[/youtube]

 

We went from \"Rohan Reborn\" to

[b]The LoTR Project[/b]

 

Those familiar with the mods earlier

stages, might remember it all starting

with Kclimer13, and PonyKiller.

With these two being our team leaders;

we are still continuing on the path

we started.

 

 

A mod aimed at making Skyrim

Middle-Earths parallel universe.

Merging spects from both world while staying true

to the story!

 

This is not a new mod, but something

evolved!

 

So, if you want more, show your support

by endorsing and heading over to our website

and signing up! We also have allready had two

blogs write about us! Go to our website to find

the link!

 

========================================

[b][size=8]What we plan[/b][/size]

 

The Famous Cities

-

Dragons? No, Nazgul!

-

Fully voiced quests

-

Historical Items

-

AND MORE...

 

========================================

[b]Our Website[/b]

 

Our website is our HQ!

This means that all major news will be posted

there!

 

Our site also gets early content..

Kinda like pre-releases.

 

So head on over at

http://skyrimretexture.webs.com/

 

========================================

[b]Change log[/b]:

Version 1.0:

Alpha release! Our christmas present

to you!

 

========================================

[b]Enjoy!And marry x\'mas from the LPteam![/b][/font][/center]
author: LPteam
